title: Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, Portable Speaker with Microphone, Wireless Waterproof Speaker for Travel, Outdoor and Pool Use, Black
descriptions:
Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, the ultimate portable speaker for all your adventures! This sleek black speaker is not only wireless and waterproof with an IP67 rating, but it also floats on water, making it perfect for poolside parties or beach trips. 

Experience deep, clear, and immersive audio with exclusive PositionIQ technology and custom-engineered transducer. Its compact design and utility loop make it easy to carry and store while its rugged construction ensures durability against water, dust, drops, and even UV light. 

With up to 12 hours of battery life per charge, rechargeable with a USB-C cable in just 4 hours, this speaker is always ready to go. Plus, the built-in microphone allows for hands-free calls and access to Siri or Google Assistant. 

Stay connected within a 30-foot range and enjoy customizable settings and software updates with the Bose Connect App. Don't miss out on the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker – your perfect companion for travel, outdoor adventures, and poolside fun!

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker in sleek Black! This portable speaker is perfect for all your needs, whether you're on the go, enjoying the great outdoors, or relaxing by the pool. 

Immerse yourself in deep, clear audio with exclusive technologies like PositionIQ and custom-engineered transducer. This waterproof speaker is built to last, with an IP67 rating and resistance to dust, shock, corrosion, and UV light. Plus, it floats on water for added convenience. 

With up to 12 hours of battery life, rechargeable via USB-C cable in just 4 hours, you can enjoy uninterrupted music wherever you go. The built-in microphone and access to virtual assistants like Siri and Google Assistant make hands-free calling a breeze. 

Stay connected within a 30-foot range and customize your settings with the Bose Connect App. Don't miss out on this must-have speaker for your next adventure! Get your Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker now and elevate your audio experience.

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker - the ultimate portable speaker for all your needs! Whether you're traveling, enjoying the great outdoors, or lounging by the pool, this sleek black speaker is your perfect companion.

Experience deep, clear, and immersive audio with exclusive PositionIQ technology and custom-engineered transducer. With an IP67 waterproof rating, this speaker can float on water, resist dust, shocks, corrosion, and UV light. 

The built-in microphone allows for hands-free calls and access to Siri and Google Assistant. The lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of playtime, rechargeable via USB-C cable in just 4 hours.

Compact and easy to carry, with a utility loop for security, this speaker is designed for convenience. Connect wirelessly via Bluetooth within a range of 30 feet. Enjoy the Bose Connect App for software updates and customizable settings.

Don't miss out on this durable, versatile, and high-quality speaker - get your Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker today!

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, the ultimate portable speaker for all your audio needs! Whether you're traveling, enjoying the great outdoors, or lounging by the pool, this sleek black speaker is your perfect companion.

Immerse yourself in deep, clear, and immersive audio with exclusive technologies like PositionIQ and custom-engineered transducers. And with an IP67 waterproof rating, this speaker is ready to float on water, resist dust, shocks, corrosion, and UV light.

The built-in microphone allows for hands-free calls and access to virtual assistants like Siri and Google Assistant. Plus, with the Bose Connect App, you can customize your settings and receive software updates.

With up to 12 hours of battery life per charge, this speaker is ready to keep the party going. And with a compact design and utility loop for easy transportation, you can take your music anywhere within a 30-foot range.

Don't settle for ordinary sound quality, upgrade to the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker today!

Introducing the Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker, the ultimate portable speaker for all your audio needs. This sleek black speaker is not only wireless and waterproof but also comes with a built-in microphone for hands-free calls. Perfect for travel, outdoor adventures, and poolside relaxation, this speaker delivers deep, clear, and immersive audio quality thanks to its custom-engineered transducer and PositionIQ technology.

With an IP67 waterproof rating, this speaker is dust-resistant, shock-resistant, and corrosion-resistant, making it the perfect companion for all your outdoor activities. The lithium-ion battery provides up to 12 hours of playtime and can be easily recharged with a USB-C cable in just 4 hours. Plus, with a range of up to 30 feet, you can enjoy your music without worrying about connectivity issues.

Experience the convenience of voice assistant access with Siri and Google Assistant, as well as app support through the Bose Connect App for customizable settings and software updates. The Bose SoundLink Flex Bluetooth Speaker is not just a speaker, it's a lifestyle upgrade. Get yours today and elevate your audio experience wherever you go.
